title: Regulation (EEC) No 1487/73 of the Commission of 30 May 1973 on the classification of goods under heading No 87.06 of the Common Customs Tariff
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 1487/73 OF THE COMMISSION  of 30 May 1973  on the classification of goods under heading No 87.06 of the Common Customs Tariff
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Transmission shafts, universal joints and spiders therefor, devised to provide even transmission of motive torque in motor vehicles of heading No 87.01, 87.02 or 87.03, are classified in heading No 87.06 of the Common Customs Tariff:
"Parts and accessories of the motor vehicles falling within heading No 87.01, 87.02 or 87.03."

This Regulation shall enter into force on the eighth day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
